title: how is the gym at pes electronic city campus ??

comments.body: Too good, for the first two weeks it was free, like till this Sunday it was free, now you need to pay 10k per annum to use it. About gym: damn good you have got everything you want , like everything

They got a new gym which is damn good but you have to pay.
And idk if the old gym is still there in the 4th floor.
The old gym wasn't as fancy but it was free and functional
But the one in the 1st year hostel isn't so good right?
